section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ya'qub bin Aws, from a man among the Companions of the Prophet that:when the Messenger of Allah entered Makkah on the Day of the Conquest, he said: "Indeed, every accidental killing on purpose, or resembling on purpose - killing with a whip or stick, for it are forty (she-camels) which their young in their wombs
